description:
encoding/xml: add example and docs for anon fields

Anonymous pointer fields is not yet supported.
The problem is documented in issue 3108.

messages.text:
> The anonymous pointers can wait until after Go 1.

I ended up handling that now in another CL, as I'm concerned people
start trusting on that behavior. Changed this CL to remove the
non-pointer note.

-- 
Gustavo Niemeyer
http://niemeyer.net
http://niemeyer.net/plus
http://niemeyer.net/twitter
http://niemeyer.net/blog

-- I'm not absolutely sure of anything.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Please put the non-pointer note back.
I do not want to change xml at this late point.
We need time for the packages to run and
be tested.  JSON is in the same boat.

LGTM

The anonymous pointers can wait until after Go 1.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=71e709c69318 ***

encoding/xml: add example and docs for anon fields

The problem is documented in issue 3108.
